2025-12-09T10:10:20.8699900Z [36;1mset -euo pipefail[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8700254Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8700619Z [36;1mecho "--- 1. REGERANDO CLIENTE PRISMA ---"[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8701119Z [36;1mnpx prisma generate[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8701460Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8701787Z [36;1mecho "--- 2. MONTAGEM DO PACOTE ---"[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8702231Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8702631Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8702988Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8703566Z [36;1m# Copia o App Next.js[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8703995Z [36;1mcp -R .next/standalone/. deploy/[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8704425Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8704870Z [36;1m# Copia estáticos (mas vamos limpar os pesados depois)[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8705517Z [36;1mif [ -d public ]; then cp -R public deploy/public; fi[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8706066Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8706576Z [36;1mcp -R .next/static/. deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8707038Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8707750Z [36;1mcp staticwebapp.config.json deploy/staticwebapp.config.json[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8708367Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8708720Z [36;1mecho "--- 3. OTIMIZAÇÃO DO ARTEFATO ---"[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8709474Z [36;1m# Mantemos o node_modules já empacotado pelo output "standalone" do Next.js[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8710312Z [36;1m# (ele já contém apenas as dependências necessárias em produção).[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8711076Z [36;1m# Depois removemos metadados de repositório e realizamos a poda fina.[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8711857Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/.git deploy/.github deploy/.husky deploy/.vscode[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8712425Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8712925Z [36;1m# Mantemos os binários Debian do Prisma (compatíveis com o runner do SWA)[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8713673Z [36;1m# e removemos apenas arquivos grandes ou não usados.[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8714304Z [36;1mbash scripts/prune-deploy-artifact.sh deploy[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8714785Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8715092Z [36;1mecho "--- 4. AÇÕES EXTRA ---"[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8715542Z [36;1m# Esvaziar pasta Public da FUNCTION[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8716256Z [36;1m# (Os arquivos estáticos já foram subidos para o CDN na etapa de build padrão)[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8717107Z [36;1m# A Function não precisa dos vídeos MP4/MOV, apenas o navegador precisa.[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8718146Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mp4" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8718710Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mov" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8719223Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.jpg" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8719732Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.png" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8720167Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8720440Z [36;1m# Limpeza Geral[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8720794Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/docs[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8721184Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/logs[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8721629Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/Vitrine-De-Craques-App[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8722158Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/Vitrine-De-Craques-App-iOS[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8722598Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8722925Z [36;1mecho "--- 5. RELATÓRIO FINAL ---"[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8723405Z [36;1mecho "Tamanho Total (Meta: < 100MB):"[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8723847Z [36;1mdu -sh deploy[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8724172Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:10:20.8724666Z [36;1mecho "Conteúdo de @next (bins presentes no artefato final):"[0m
